mapper.select: SELECT CLASSESTREE_CODE AS classestreeCode ,A.LEVEL_NAME AS levelName ,A.LEVEL_CODE AS levelCode FROM PD_CLASSESTREE A WHERE A.TREE_LEVEL = #{filterMap.level} AND A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode} ORDER BY A.LEVEL_CODE

SELECT CLASSESTREE_CODE AS classestreeCode ,A.LEVEL_NAME AS level3Name ,A.LEVEL_CODE AS level3Code ,A.PARENT_CODE AS parentCode FROM PD_CLASSESTREE A

ORDER BY A.LEVEL_CODE
